Name: Strength
Description: Strength represents the raw physical ability of your character.

Name: Toughness
Description: Toughness is the health and stamina of your character.

Name: Agility
Description: Agility is the coordination and quickness of your character.

Name: Focus
Description: Focus is the depth of perception, patience, and empathy of your character.

Name: Intelligence
Description: Intelligence is the capacity for understanding and learning.

Name: Charisma
Description: Charisma is the influence and physical beauty of your character.
